summary: REQ-5 and REQ-6 appear to be implemented: AdminUsersTab now passes a typed Principal into the approval mutation, the mutation normalizes/validates via parsePrincipal before calling the backend, and UI-facing error messaging is added via an Alert + getUserFriendlyError. However, there are unrequested changes to meta/summary files that describe unrelated features.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added broad unrelated frontend feature summaries (e.g., VLOOKUP, layout changes, reminder notifier, export features) in a project-wide summary file, which were not requested as part of fixing admin approve/reject Principal handling.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to fixing Admin Users approve/reject Principal handling and adding UI validation/error messaging; the diff includes changes to a summary file describing many unrelated features.

hallucinated_features.description: Project state tracking updates (new_feature_requests, known issues) not explicitly requested as part of the fix.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention updating project_state.json; this appears to be ancillary bookkeeping outside the stated requirements.
